name: Bank Payments
description: Accept credit or debit card payments.

name: Cryptocurrency Payments
description: Accept Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ethereum and Litecoin payments.

name: Payment Admin
description: View and manage payments as an administrator.

name: Saved Cards
description: Allow users to secure store their credit or debit card information.

name: Split Payments
description: Allows users to split transaction fees across two accounts.

name: Subscription Billing
description: Bill users on a time determined basis.
